H0.text: Which city of central Spain was renowned throughout the Middle Ages as an important center for the production of swords and other bladed instruments. Madrid

H1.text: Which city of central Spain was renowned throughout the Middle Ages as an important center for the production of swords and other bladed instruments. Salamanca

H2.text: Which city of central Spain was renowned throughout the Middle Ages as an important center for the production of swords and other bladed instruments. Segovia

H3.text: Which city of central Spain was renowned throughout the Middle Ages as an important center for the production of swords and other bladed instruments. Toledo

A4.text: Toledo has been a traditional sword-making, steel-working centre since about 500 BCE

A5.text: Between the 15th and 17th centuries, the Toledo sword-making industry enjoyed a great boom
